message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,500. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What do you think?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it brings. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  While that price doesn't quite work for me, I'm willing to come down a bit to $12,800.  I believe this price point reflects the true value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counteroffer at $12,500 for the product.
